content: > **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase > subscribe here 1 ** join my fb group to share your makes get exclusive discounts cal s and free patterns join ** here 3 ** ** the pdf pattern provides an easy to follow photo tutorial ** this beautifully textured cowl is worked in a round using a variation of the mini bean stitch to create a cozy yet very elegant crochet cowl this crochet cowl is easy to make and works up quickly stitches used in this pattern single_crochet half_double_crochet mini bean stitch skill level - easy the pattern is written using english u s terminology hook size needed g / 4 0 mm i use ** tulip etimo 5 ** hook the shawl is crocheted with sport #2 weight yarn i used ** knit pick - paragon sprot 6 ** amount of yarn needed 170gr/381m/418yds if you have any questions regarding the pattern feel free to contact me copyright © 2022 gootie agat rottman-cassel all rights reserved the pattern and photos in this design are property of gootie you can sell the finished product on a small scale if you write about this product online please give credit to the original pattern please note that there is only a certain amount of variations possible when one crochets and any similarities to other patterns are purely coincidental to the best of my knowledge this pattern is my original unique design return/refund policy due to the fact that it is impossible to return a digital file all sales are final 1 https //madebygootie myflodesk com/ravelry-sign-up 3 https //www facebook com/groups/220830062977059 5 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=726901&u=2493284&m=59159&urllink=www%2ecrochet%2ecom%2ftulip%2detimo%2dcrochet%2dhook%2dset%2fp%2f85193&afftrack=ravelry 6 http //shrsl com/33a61
